DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine efficacy safety topical application gel compare placebo nail psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Tazarotene Gel Nail Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Key inclusion criterion : Mild moderate nail psoriasis least one fingernail Key exclusion criterion : skin condition , potential affect nail interfere evaluation disease ; history hypersensitivity retinoids component trial medication topical treatment nail antipsoriatics 4 week precede treatment phase ; systemic treatment psoriasis within three month treatment phase trial trial intralesional steroid injection treatment phase trial phototherapy treatment phase trial ; chronic infection condition capable interfere conduct trial ; evidence drug alcohol abuse ; symptom clinically significant illness may influence outcome trial four week precede treatment phase trial ; participation another clinical trial within last 4 week prior first treatment clinical trial ; pregnancy nursing ;
